name: Accept! (Ukeireru!)
description:
You play as Setsuna Himari a 16 Year Old School Girl that has a Crush On Mitsuki Okaishi but she has 5 persons that want to take him away from her she will do everything to have him,even if it means killing them.

(remember the game is in devlopment so there will be uptades,and i am not very good at game devlopment so the devlopment will be Slow.)
